!!!COM: Bach, Johann Sebastian
!!!CDT: 1685/3//-1750/7/28/
!!!OTL@@DE: Aus meines Herzens Grunde
!!!OTL@EN:  From the depths of my heart
!!!AGN: 4-Part Chorale
!!!SCT: BH 001
!!!SCT: BWV 269
!!!ONB1: Text by Georg Niege; 16th Century secular melody, first appears
!!!ONB2: in sacred use in Neu Catechismus-Gesangbchlein, Hamburg, 1598.

!!!SMA: 371 Bach Chorales, edited by Ludwig Erk, C.F. Peters
!!!PDT: 1850, 1865
!!!ONB: Harmony and Root analysis done manually by Craig Sapp
!! Beat 2 of measure 1 chord could also be IVb (with root on C)
!!linebreak: 2
!!chor2scor: -l 2 -s 0.6 -o %b.pmx
